room_title: Escape room "The Dollhouse" by Curious Escape Rooms in Boston
review: We had a great time in the dollhouse! We did not escape but came pretty close. This is great fun for tweens, they didn't roll their eyes once.

room_title: Escape room "The Dollhouse" by Curious Escape Rooms in Boston
review: My family and I had an amazing time! Dollhouse was a fun and definitely had us guessing! We'll be back to try the next one!

room_title: Escape room "The Dollhouse" by Curious Escape Rooms in Boston
review: My wife and I decided to go (her idea) and we ended up having a blast. We were teamed up with 3 other people and we all got along great. The hour does go quick so don't dilly dally around. I would highly recommend it to anyone who enjoys a good puzzle or clue game.

room_title: Escape room "The Dollhouse" by Curious Escape Rooms in Boston
review: Curious Escape Rooms is a fantastic addition to Downtown Fitchburg! I was trapped in the Dollhouse room with a group of friends, and even though we did not escape (it's a tricky one!), everyone in our group had a blast. Audrey was a fantastic host/gamemaster, and we will definitely be back for the next puzzle (or to give this one another shot!)

room_title: Escape room "The Dollhouse" by Curious Escape Rooms in Boston
review: Such a fun night! Even if you don't make it out, it's a blast. The clues are very varied, so even for people who don't feel they do well at puzzles, there's something for everyone to figure out. Love the way they put everything together and the way the theme worked.
